item.title: Data Stragety - 201: Requirements Gathering
item.description: “Short Short Courses” are questions meant to prompt the reader to think and reflect. In my time as a tech lead I’ve found that asking questions is far more important than laying out answers. Imagine you’re in a meeting with your team and someone asks these questions of you, would you have a good answer? And if you don’t have good answers, now is your chance to start asking these questions.
